name: Glaze
description:
More of a tech demo that a game right now.  The goal for the project is to support very large Terraria like 2D game environment in the browser.  Currently it supports 16000x16000 world (this demo level is just 400x200!

Things to do:

  • Switches open things
  • Use the teleporter
  • Heavy things help you sink
  • Try to get the water container
Keys: KeyActionKeyActionKeyActionWASD Move/Fly Space Fire Projectile or throw (hold for more power)1-2 Select Projectile H Hold Item J Drop Item E Aim L Torch U Bees!!
